ðŸ“– Summary: Puter is an open-source internet operating system designed for personal cloud management, web application development, and remote desktop access. It serves as a self-hostable alternative to services like Dropbox and Google Drive, offering a platform for users to keep their files, apps, and games accessible from anywhere. The project also fosters a community for learning about web development and cloud computing.
